website_summaries.verdict: Resists sweat, holds up to extreme weight, and will make you say "Aahhhh" as your back opens up .
pros: Just 0.25" in padding is enough to comfortably deepen your backbend with confidence and core stabilization
Great for those with chronic pain in need of added support
Helps conquer new poses such as King Pigeon
cons: May snag long hair if it isn't tied up or tucked away

customer_reviews.title: Back pain nearly gone!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic back pain. Pain every second for the last 17 years. I have had 3 surgeries, tons of physical therapy, and tried countless gadgets promising pain relief...without relief. I received this yoga wheel and I immediately did a backbend. I got up and 90% of my pain was gone!! I now use it 2 to 3 times a day and my back hasn't felt this good in 17 years!!! I feel like I have a new life! I am so happy that I purchased this!
customer_reviews.author: A. Moran

customer_reviews.title: great back crackin'!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have a large bosom and I tend to hunch over. I wanted to extend my back backwards and get some good stretches in. This definitely does the trick! I got some good back cracking in as well!! Once you receive it, it doesn't come with a guide. You have to access their website to get the guide. It doesn't seem like THAT MUCH you can do with the yoga wheel, but then again, I'm not that creative with it just yet. The guide has 18 poses it gives you (6 beginner, 6 intermediate, and 6 advanced).
customer_reviews.author: Ciana

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! The company sent a little email that has some poses to get me started and it really helped! I have used this wheel SO much. It helps with many stretches, poses, and stabilization. It is really sturdy so you don't have to worry about it bending or anything as you are using it. Seriously though, get it! The picture I posed is my first time trying this pose with the wheel. I had never even come close to that before without it!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: This yoga wheel is whoa.
customer_reviews.text: This yoga wheel is whoa. It allowed me to attempt (and succeed) king pigeon on the first try---something I definitely wouldn't try without the wheel. I was immediately happy with the puchase when I laid back onto it; this feels very supportive and is covered with a spongy tread that doesn't feel uncomfortable against the spine. It is fantastic for a "restorative" fish pose and so much more sturdy than using the highest side of a block. Tie your hair up in a bun on top of your crown though or you'll catch and roll over a pony tail.
customer_reviews.author: HelloKitteh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiest wheel around
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my UpCircleSeven Yoga Wheel. Before I purchased I researched many different wheels and decided to choose this one. Let me tell you, I am not disappointed. This wheel has assisted me in so many yoga poses and has helped me to even strengthen my inversions. I am also a private yoga instructor and this wheel even assists me in my classes; whether beginner or advanced, this wheel serves an amazing purpose every time. I can’t wait to try more items from this company, they truly are one of the best out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jahnee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I'd hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: My yoga wheel came in and it's beautiful! Very sturdy as well! I love that a follow up email was sent with a user guide that I easily downloaded, (saving paper) to use as I try to figure how to properly use this device. I cannot wait to see how far my yoga progresses with my new yoga wheel!!! Thank you UpCircleSeven!! **Update** After a couple of months use, this wheel is still staying strong. I've learned so much with this and continue to improve poses!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Giannascoli

customer_reviews.title: Nice try, doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Well... Seems like a good idea, use a circular support ring for all sorts of back stretching movements, unfortunately this particular product is poorly designed because of extremely low stability. The ring is so narrow that if you wave or even slightly to either the right or the left you’ll find the ring suddenly crashing down underneath you with your back landing on it sharp edge. I did this quite a few times, therefore you really need to be careful not to tip over on it. Basically it’s just too narrow to be useful.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: use with extreme caution
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this product as I practice yoga regularly and looked forward to backbend support as well as back tightness relief. On first try, the wheel collapse, fell sideways, my back fell onto the hard plastic with the hard edges pressing painfully into my spine. It's been a week and I still am recovering. Use this product with extreme caution -- do not put weight on it. If anything, should be used as a light prop only.
customer_reviews.author: advanced yogi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: This product looks like it will put your spine in place, BUT what actually happens is it falls over while you are trying to roll your spine and you go slamming to the ground on top of the disk. HATE this product. Causes more injury.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Nielson

customer_reviews.title: Great if your still young
customer_reviews.text: Kinda wanna give this gift a 5 star rating. I gifted it to my 65 year old mom who has some back problems. She uses it every day and says it helps a lot, but unfortunately it has a bit of a design flaw if you're that old and particularly frail. It's real narrow and getting on it isn't the smoothest or safest operation. 5/5 if your like under the age of 50 and in good shape. If life has kinda beaten you down a bit or your old, I just wanna recommend caution. You can fall from if you're not too careful. It's only like a foot, but anything can happen.
customer_reviews.author: WearyTraveler

customer_reviews.title: meh.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this based on reviews and because it was cheaper than the other options. however now i know why. its not quite as sturdy and slips frequently from underneath the back. a better grip on this would be a welcome addition. overall not recommended. try another product.
customer_reviews.author: T S

customer_reviews.title: Not for me ...
customer_reviews.text: This didn’t work for me. I bought it in hopes of stretching my back. My upper back, shoulders and neck area are always tight. I’m overweight, not fit or flexible and in my forties. I’m also prone to motion sickness. I used this wheel by slowly rolling backwards into the stretching position shown online with my head hanging down. Just this motion made me very dizzy. So I returned the wheel. My fit, flexible teen used it once and quickly popped her back and loved it. I’m sure it works for a lot of people, but if you’re like me you might want to skip this one. Return shipping is around $9.
customer_reviews.author: the Carters

customer_reviews.title: Foam cork is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this purchase. The wood seems decent but the cork is basically just foam that’s been glued onto the wheel. There is visible glue and there a gap where the two ends of the “cork” meet. Really disappointed with craftspersonship that went into this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ouch, so slippery!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return unfortunately. Love the shape of the wheel however the grippy part is more cushioned and slippery. That’s the opposite of what you need from a yoga wheel. I slipped off it a couple of times in the simplest positions. I wouldn’t even think to try to stand on this wheel. After a couple of tries and bruises I sent it back!
customer_reviews.author: Manda

customer_reviews.title: BEST AMAZON PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Best Amazon purchase I’ve made! I got it as a gift for my daughter on amazon and she says it’s the perfect size and has just enough padding on the wheel to make stretching more comfortable. She even uses it to for strengthening her core and practice with press handstands! If anyone wants to see videos/pictures of how she uses it, you should check out her instagram @omseany !
customer_reviews.author: eimcmullin

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY.. It literally snapped in half first use. Luckily the trash came the same day, it went right into the garbage truck, just where it belongs!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: functional, and unexpectedly beautiful to look at
customer_reviews.text: I'm still finding new ways to incorporate this yoga wheel into my practice- its a great tool for getting creative with balancing and I also use it to add more challenge to bodyweight exercises. What really makes this product stand out is that it's nice to look at- it looks well made, and I appreciate the attention to detail with the rounded edge and padded outer surface. My exercise equipment always ends up as living room decor, so the aesthetically pleasing design is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: CersarTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is not for beginners. It will easily fall to the side causing you to fall on the circle, and trust me that's painful. Had to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Design
customer_reviews.text: I really love the hefty construction of this wheel as a plus sized individual. It doesn't flex and it's wide enough to not wobble (like maybe if you leaned really far to one side, but not in normal use). It helps me to crack pretty much every vertebrae as well as presses on where most of my knots form or begin in. Hurts badly (I have really tight, bad muscles, I see a chiropractor twice a month as well as deep tissue massage therapy each month to help combat my pain and issues) but I'm used to having to cause more pain to get deep muscle releases. Great product for me!
customer_reviews.author: Avi Peace

customer_reviews.title: Only one thing I don't like
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. It's fun and relaxing to use and makes me feel like more of a yogi than I am. The only negative thing I've found so far about this is the foam that's adhered to the ring has a cut across it (where it was looped around and cut to match the circumference). It isn't giving me any problems now but this cut looks a little looser on the edges, and I hope with continued use it doesn't fall off. But I got the 1 year warranty from the company so if it gives me any problems in the future, I'm covered until then.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! I don't do yoga but I use a foam roller a lot. This thing works! I feel like it stretches and decompresses my spine. Just 5 minutes in the morning brings be pain relief for hours. Using this right before bed gives me a good nights sleep without tossing and turning all night. Thank god for the good people who invented this.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: I have recently re-started my yoga practice but I have a lot of lower back pain. I was looking for a way to integrate the two and I came upon this product. I was hesitant to try it, but after about 2 weeks of using it, my lower back feels much better and the learning curve was not nearly as steep as I thought it would be. Additionally, the product support through this company has been amazing- they followed up the day I received the product with a user guide to ensure I didn't hurt myself and they have emailed additional follow-ups to make sure the product met my expectations. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mcm

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth a try
customer_reviews.text: My wife has back pain often after her exercise classes. She seems to like this, and it does crack her upper back. She hasn’t experienced the same with her lower back. I think everyone’s back situation is somewhat unique, so in my opinion results will vary. However, I think it is worth a try for sure. The product itself seems to be of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used this a few times. It took awhile for the guide to get sent to my email after requested, so I ended up looking for general exercises initially. It did feel good to stretch. A friend with a bad back gave it a try and it cracked/popped his back which he was ecstatic about. I can’t speak to long term relief but it allowed me to do yoga moves I haven’t been able to do before, which was great! I’m a larger girl (230+) and this stood up to the test with ease. My friend is nearly 400lbs. (we’re talking line-backer build) and it flexed a little but provided a good stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, better than a foam roller
customer_reviews.text: Using this for therapy on my back, neck and strengthening. Takes a minute to get used to but very sturdy. I rolled on it to crack my back and it was a better and deeper crack than I got with a foam roller. You are at a much more severe angle and can actually get into a back bend if your comfortable doing that. I use it against the wall and do squats, and I’ve looked up some other stretches on U-tube. Company checks in with you so I would bet they stand behind their product. My Physical Therapist is getting one to use at his clinic and has given me some excercises that I can do at home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wheel not so much to do yoga but just to stretch out my back and relieve some pain that I had been having. The wheel works great but you need to make sure that you are extremely careful when using it’s because the wheel isn’t that wide and when you are laying on it and slowly rolling back, if you don’t roll straight back, the wheel will slip out from under you causing you to land on the hard part of the wheel potentially causing serious pain or damage to your spine. So as long as you are careful when you use it, it’s a great wheel and it is very sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: P. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, you can hurt yourself!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I think it’s well made BUT if you’re not super limber, be careful trying to roll it under your back! I think because my core muscles are lacking and I’m not as limber as I used to be, this tweaked my mid back. I know the yogis make these look like a great tool (and it probably is for them) but if you don’t have the ability to do a backbend without this, don’t try to roll it from under your shoulders down to your lower back, it’s more difficult than it looks. If you do try, I recommend having a spotter... just sayin!! Be careful!!
customer_reviews.author: Jag

customer_reviews.title: Great for upper back pain and fun for an entire family.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the whole family! Since Covid struck, we all have became a little bit more inactive. We are a family of 5. We just got Beach Body on Demand. We all absolutely love the yoga! Which inspired us to look for other yoga workouts and tools. I suffer from horrible upper back pain, but it's been so hard to stretch and mobilize that area. This product has been EXTREMELY helpful in stretching out my upperback. It's honestly just a wonderful product. Even our 6 year old uses it!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi M

customer_reviews.title: I am walking and standing straighter.
customer_reviews.text: I loved the self adjustment I gave myself using this wheel for the first time and the ability to control how long I want pressure on various portions of my back. I recommend using with “toesox” as regular socks might not let your grip if you are on hardwood. This is a slow and gradual use tool. I love it and I’m very happy with it. The cork covering is unobtrusive and calming-also adds a little more padding to the wheel.
customer_reviews.author: TheSaint

customer_reviews.title: Love this wheel!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d never tried a yoga wheel before, but I’m so happy I finally heard about them, and decided to buy this. I’m not incredibly fit at the moment, but I was able to do most of the beginner and intermediate poses from the ebooklet right away. It felt amazing on my back, and what a workout it actually was! I was feeling it in my abs for a few days, just from doing a few basic exercises. I wasn’t expecting the ab workout at all, so that made me very happy. I have the pink one and I love the color. VERY solid and sturdy. Great product all around.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Xtine

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: First, I'm no Yoga aficionado, so please take this for what it's worth. I have had a bad back for a couple years as a result of my being overweight for so long and my grueling airline travel. I tried an exercise ball at my wife's request but it hadn't done much for me. This does an amazing job at stretching my back out, especially in my lower (lumbar) area to the point that I can actually score a pop and crack out of it. It's durable, sturdy and overall worth every single penny.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Vertigo no go
customer_reviews.text: If you get vertigo, this is not for you. I was in a bad car accident that left me with severe vertigo. I bought this to eleviate back pain and stretch it out due to IT job but using this to stretch causes vertigo as I'm now super sensitive to it since the accident. It does work to help my back but for me it's not worth it due to it causing me vertigo.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Provided Almost Immediate Relief from Sciatica Pain ...
customer_reviews.text: A painful sciatica and an upcoming cruise caused me to look for something that would relieve the problem. I tried my daughter’s yoga wheel and felt better immediately. Because I did not need three different sizes, I searched Amazon and found the “UpCircleSeven Yoga Wheel”. It was the perfect size and could be shipped quickly. The wheel is sturdy and attractive. By draping myself over the wheel, I can “open up” my spine and feel immediate relief.
customer_reviews.author: delicateflower152

customer_reviews.title: Still Going Strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wheel when I first started my yoga journey. I was unsure of which products were best. I saw good reviews and a good price so I went with this. So glad I did. Two years later and still going strong. I’ve learned handstand, headstand, pincha while using this and don’t even get me started on all the delicious stretches you can use it for! This is a must!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M Mancillas

customer_reviews.title: Relieved months of waking up in pain
customer_reviews.text: About a year ago, I began waking every morning with mid-back pain and limited ROM. I tried switching pillows, mattresses, etc., and eventually it got so bad I was taking an Aleve before going to bed. I saw an ad for a much more expensive competitor, which got me to this one -- WOW -- after a few days of use, I no longer wake up with the back pain. No more drugs. It was a little painful to use at first, but it was very clear where the issues were. I just roll that level a few times each evening. Couldn't be happier with this.
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not good for my chronic pain
customer_reviews.text: Very Very painful for me. I have fibromyalgia, 5 herniated disc (1 bulging) between my back/neck, degeneration, spinal stenosis and osteoarthritis. I cannot bare to try pressing this thing against my back again. I was hoping after 1 massage per this month along with chiropractic treatments (that make me hurt terribly) that this would help stretch this spot in my back that is causing extreme discomfort since Feb 2020. I'm sure this is great for a person with less to zero spinal issues.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my self care tool kit!
customer_reviews.text: I love this yoga wheel. My girlfriend and I use it frequently. It has helped open my back, shoulders and neck tremendously. I feel like a different person now. I could hardly lay on this in the beginning because I was so stiff and now it just feels normal. I can feel my body craving this yoga wheel. It is inexpensive, durable and doesn't take up much space. Great for a minimalist athlete (or anyone looking for pain relief) on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: AmzonGuy

customer_reviews.title: May help, may not
customer_reviews.text: The yoga wheel looks fun, but I only use it for about 2 minutes a day if I can remember. It doesn't pop my back, but it keeps relieve some pressure while massaging my spine. My husband doesn't have a sore back and said this hurts. I find it uncomfortable but usually worth it if in pain. I've tried watching yoga videos that use this, but like I said after 2 minutes I'm over it. Maybe if it was a little more narrow to fit between the shoulder blades better, it would be more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F90

customer_reviews.title: Not happy w it.
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with it, hurts my back I ran out of time to return so it’s sitting in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Durable and supportive!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this yoga wheel. In my mid forties and overweight, I was looking for something that would help me stretch my spine and muscles and support my larger physique. This wheel is amazing! It supports my weight with ease (I believe it says up to 500#) and supports my back. We spend hours hunched over and I sit against the wheel or roll it down my spine to open my chest. Couldn’t be happier with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Start slow, be consistent, and it can make a huge difference
customer_reviews.text: I've had a killer knot in my lower back for years and over the past few months this tool has reduced it to nothing. If you don't normally do some kind of yoga or stretching you need to take it easy and start with a minute or two (it will hurt in a good way). Remember to keep your shoulders pulled back so you're massaging muscle and not hurting your spine. I'm no professional so check with your doctor before using this yoga wheel. It's a great value and I love mine!
customer_reviews.author: Espresso fiend

customer_reviews.title: Crack doesn’t have to be whack
customer_reviews.text: Five minutes into taking this out the box I transitioned smoothly from sitting on a plastic wheel and appreciating its sturdiness to rolling onto my lower back and immediately feeling the pleasant crack of three vertebrae. This prop feel extremely versatile and just messing around for a bit it seemed clear the wheel could take me that crucial extra inch when stretching. The pain induced impulse buy is officially justified. Anyone who’s active or suffers from back pain should own one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Kanishmas

customer_reviews.title: Great for ribs
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: I do not practice yoga. I got this to help me roll out my back as an upgrade from a foam roller. I frequently have ribs slip out and have to put them back in either by myself or with a chiropractor. This wheel is AMAZING. I immediately rolled out on it and felt my chest and back loosen up. Then I started to play around with it and while I can't do a full proper headstand yet, I have no doubt this wheel will get me there faster if I practice enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla C.

customer_reviews.title: Good Tool for ROM
customer_reviews.text: I caved and finally got a yoga wheel 8 weeks after complicated meniscus repair surgery. Using to help backbends was the intended purpose, however a nice surprise was a PDF the company sent with instructions for different mobility exercises. This is exactly what I need! The wheel is sturdy and allows me to work on lost ranges of motion during a long recovery. Please note that I am working with a physical therapist and not doing anything that stresses the injury - one should always listen to their PT/doctor when recovering from injury. This is a great tool!
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: So far I love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving this wheel. I got the wheel to stretch with. My back is very tight and causes issues for me, someone recommended a yoga wheel to help with stretching. I found this one and it had good reviews so I purchased it. It is helping tremendously with my stretching, I am not very flexible at all, and this help me to get a really good stretch and it is beautiful to look at.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ladek

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been practicing yoga for a few years, but I am older and can't do the poses you see in the photos with this wheel. But it still helps my practice. Just laying across it on my back with head and foot support provides a good stretch and no pain. It also is a great height (between small and large blocks) for me to support my Triangle and other standing poses. I was worried it would feel scary to put weight on it, but I feel totally secure. This wheel is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: never too old to learn :)

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love love this yoga wheel. I have big boobs and sometimes my back gives up on carrying them. This thing has made such a difference firy back. Whenever I feel thight and in pain I just roll on it behind my bank breathe and stay still for a bit, I kid you not, I get up with my back feeling much looser. I've also started using it in my yoga practice and is definitely a game changer. Glad I gave myself a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Elsy Moran

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-built; great for back pain & posture
customer_reviews.text: I bought this yoga wheel primarily to adjust my back. I am very impressed with how sturdy & durable it is. It has definitely helped my back pain & improved my posture, more so than my inversion table. My kids have used it and had similar benefits. Definitely worth the money. Cons: Users really need to be cautious & use the wheel slowly & carefully. Otherwise, it will tip over easily and you will land right on top of it, causing further pain.
customer_reviews.author: Scot M.

customer_reviews.title: No regrets
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this yoga wheel in the morning and at night before going to bed and found that it has helped my back pain tremendously. I am a hairstylist and have really tight shoulders and back since I work with my hands up all the time. This helps to stretch out my muscles and realign my spine. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Helps me lessen upper thoracic spine Issues.
customer_reviews.text: I first noticed yoga rings by chance while watching YouTube videos. After they caught my interest, I searched on Amazon for one. Once I read reviews on a few different brands, I decided to go with UpCircleSeven. What I like about this 12” yoga wheel is the range of motion it provides. I haven’t used it that much yet, but when I have, the difference in how my back felt was significantly better. As for the materials, the wheel itself is more than sturdy and there’s just enough padding to feel comfortable. Overall, I am really satisfied with this yoga wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Well heck! I thought I already reviewed this, but it isn't appearing. :shrug: Anyway, I put this cork monster right to work, and it DOES put you right to work, but in a good way. My husband came home from work while I was doing an inversion position and he came real close, with a quizzical look, and I quit, asking him what's up? He said he couldn't figure out what he was looking at, hah. You NEED this!
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe on it and it also provides a great adjustment to my spine
customer_reviews.text: I want to chime in on the reviews. I'm just over 300 pounds and this thing holds me very well. I feel safe on it and it also provides a great adjustment to my spine. This item is very sturdy and worth a try if you currently use a foam roller to massage your back. This product works well before and/or after using a foam roller and I wouldn't be without this roller again. Great customer service too.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, easy to use, and it helps w/ my lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: I am not into yoga, but I wanted to start moving my body a little bit more and get some more flexibility. I do some stretching exercises following videos on YouTube and omg I didn’t know I needed this wheel so bad. It has helped with my lower back pain and I’m still working on that range of motion but I would totally recommend it. Even my husband has been using it and he loves it. The wheel is sturdy and does the job. I think the size is okay since I have anything else to compare to. My husband is a big guy and said the wheel fits on his back perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Pereira de Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Love this wheel.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I love the cushioning. I have tried other wheels with less cushioning and they really hurt. This one is nice and soft. The down side to the cushioning is it makes more unstable. But I prefer the cushioning than the more stable and hard wheel. I also love the pink color!!
customer_reviews.author: julianaoh

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a deserted item I’d want with me
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. It’s my go-to for backaches and I’ve tried a LOT of different products. I’ve used foam rollers, pressure point balls, tennis balls, the Back pod; and this is my go-to. It’s incredibly sturdy, spongy enough to be comfortable but the inner plastic ring is solid. My backbends in my yoga practice have increased exponentially and I have much better range in them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS is the one!!!  Great company & great yoga wheel.
customer_reviews.text: I researched yoga wheels for months and decided to go with UPCIRCLESEVEN based on consistently high customer ratings. The wheel is top notch and the customer service is THE BEST!! I had a small issue with my wheel and this company went above and beyond. (THANK U, UPCIRCLESEVEN). Without doubt or any hesitation I recommend this wheel to friends, family--everyone. I am excited to continue practicing with my yoga wheel and when I am ready for a swing, I will be getting one from UPCIRCLESEVEN.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: Useful and helpful.
customer_reviews.text: I have only just begun using this product in my practice. So far it has been useful for deeper stretches and postures. I also notice it has improved my balance and strength in postures. I particularly like that it moves with you through translation and is not clumsy or cumbersome. It works like blocks but much more smoothly. My children love to lay over it for back stretches. It is useful and functional.
customer_reviews.author: JMMaser

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great gift idea.
customer_reviews.text: I was actually pretty skeptical about buying this because there are so many "in" and "hip" ways to work out and such these days. This was worth it! The first time I played back onto it, my back was just stretched out. It was such a relief. Great for most ages. Perfect gift idea for that health conscious person in your life.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Grace

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Results !
customer_reviews.text: I use my yoga wheel just a few minutes a day to stretch. I am not very active when it comes to exercising so it has been a little bit of a slow process for me but my back is feeling a lot better ! I am able to do more exercises every time I use it. There is no doubt at all that the yoga wheel is sturdy. This helps make exercise a little more fun and is getting me in a better place of balance and flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: I really like it, very versatile
customer_reviews.text: This is more narrow and up higher than my foam roller but I use it the same way as far as rolling out; has been consistently popping my back and is helping for stretching all sorts of ways. Best part is I can sit on it without any give so it's great to adjust position and gain leverage. -DRAWBACK, since it has foam it may wobble just a bit so be careful side to side; but very study material!
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bozeman

customer_reviews.title: Start your day with this stretch.
customer_reviews.text: I have mild scoliosis and I'm alway looking for a new toy to improve my tweaky back. This wheel feels incredible. Imagine when you wake up and your face is stiff from sleep, you open your mouth and eyes as wide as you can and smack your cheeks to get the blood going. That's what this wheel does for my whole body. After a few minutes on the wheel I feel loose and straight and ready for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t aware of yoga wheels until a week ago and I’ve been doing yoga for years. I got sick during the covid pandemic. I was in pain from my neck down to my right ankle. When I got strong enough I did some restorative yoga poses to help ease the pain. I came across a Yoga video on Pinterest using a wheel. Out of curiosity I bought this. I’ve used it everyday since I got this. I’m able to to do 3-4 poses stretching my spine and the difference in my pain level is enormous. My pain has remarkably gone down. This is a great quality yoga wheel. Best buy so far.
customer_reviews.author: rosenyc

customer_reviews.title: Great to stretch out a tight back
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to help loosen tight back as seen on Plexus Wheel commercial. This wheel works great. I put my hands on the floor and keep some of my body weight supported by my arms at first, then gradually let more of my weight go directly onto the wheel for more deep tissue work on my back. Works well on upper and lower back. I can see where the small wheel would work even better for targeting the upper back/neck area but I haven't tried that one yet.
customer_reviews.author: JennyM75

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this Yoga Wheel
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Yoga Wheel. I wasn't expecting much, assuming I would just use for stretching here and there. After the first two days of using it for approximately 5 minutes a day, my back/shoulders/neck and even hip flexors feel so much looser. I just get my yoga mat out at night, put the wheel down, and do a few simple stretches with it rolling underneath my back- up and down the spine. I "hang out" for a few minutes with it underneath my upper back and then my lower back, and the effects are immediate. The wheel itself even looks nice-I purchased the cork. Very pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: STL

customer_reviews.title: Great, Sturdy Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I saw it in a yoga studio and thought it would help me with my back bends. I have very stiff back muscles and the Dharma wheel has helped me ease into positions I normally could not get into. Husband also uses it for his stiff legs and knees. So far very happy. It is strong and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Historian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: came quickly nicely made. I have since bought 2 smaller plexus wheels (only because Upcircleseven doesn't make the smaller sizes). I must say the quality of the Upcircleseven is much better. It is heavier, has a thicker wheel, and most important has a thicker and firmer cushion on the outside of the wheel. Plexus wheels were lighter and had a thinner softer cushion which actually isn't as comfortable on your back. It would be nice if Upcircleseven made some smaller diameter wheels, however after using the smaller ones (10" and 6") I can't really say that the small amount of extra stretch they provide is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Benway

customer_reviews.title: Terrific relief for a sore back
customer_reviews.text: I knew pretty much nothing about yoga wheels before my purchase; I chose this one because it was well-reviewed and came in a 10" size which suits my short stature. Prior to this, I would be stiff after sitting for 30 minutes or more, needing several steps to straighten up. Since using it a bit, though, that stiffness has evaporated and I feel like a normal human being again. Now if it could just subtract a decade or two from my age...
customer_reviews.author: M. Rosenblum

customer_reviews.title: Great for back pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: Came in super quick! I absolutely love this due to the craziness of right now i needed some of my own things for home workouts for my pain releif. I have had back problems since i had my 1st child and this wheel helps stretch and crack my back in all the right places. I highly recommend for back pain or just wanting something to help with harder yoga poses!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Fast results
customer_reviews.text: I have lower back and neck pain. I purchased this wheel because I wanted to stretch out my spine. Immediately, I noticed that my neck and lower back did not hurt as much as normal. I've started a new morning routine where I roll out and I'm excited to see what my results will be in a month or two. The wheel is extremely sturdy and I'm happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: My back loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Am not doing this thing for yoga, it feels really good on the back. The first time I used it, my back cracked in about 8 different spots. I never had something do that to my back before. 2 thumbs up. If you can't handle pain well, your first couple times you may not like this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and sturdy, extremely well made.
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical about this due to my weight, but it says it’s rated to 550 ( I’m 190 ) anyway got this because it looked like a great way to work my back. Got it in two days, and I was amazed by the sturdiness of this wheel. I’m brand new to the yoga wheel and I absolutely love this and will definately be taking yoga classes bc of this, it’s fun to work with this wheel and it’s very strong and sturdy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Lands

customer_reviews.title: Love at first try!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this, so this is only my initial review. However, my sister is a big yogi and she tried it immediately and it was love at first try! I tried it to and I felt a nice stretch. The wheel feels sturdy, yet flexible. I purchased the cork one and am please by the absence of odor and for the beautiful appearance. I’ll come back at a later time to update — if needed— and to comment on the duration.
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Oooh, feels sooooo good as my back cracked! It’s awesome and sturdy. Stable on carpet. Only down side is that my dog thinks it’s a game. (J/k). Get it. It’s awesome. (Please pardon the mess. The exterminator was coming and I had to take everything out of the kitchen. )
customer_reviews.author: HCJ

customer_reviews.title: Certainly a "best choice"
customer_reviews.text: The other reviewers are correct, this is an excellent product at a wonderful price. It is strong and comfortable and more than does the job. The only thing I would like to see is possibly an instructional video in addition to the downloadable list of exercises. Regardless, I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for a yoga wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Guleserian

customer_reviews.title: Just starting to use it but...WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I spend a lot of time at the computer and ALWAYS have tension in my upper back/shoulders/neck. I just started to use the yoga wheel but already I can tell a difference after just a few uses. It flexes my back in a way that I can't flex it without a wheel, so it helps to loosen and relax my muscles, especially after "rolling" it out. Also, Customer Service has been very impressive....already received emails with follow-up tips on how to use the yoga wheel!
customer_reviews.author: S.-My Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Simple back euphoria.
customer_reviews.text: My wife got me this for Christmas after asking for one. And it is definitely worth the money. I spend maybe only a 5 or so minutes on it after working every evening and it is euphoric. It stretches, massages and even cracks my back on occasion. Very much enjoy this product and think it would probably be beneficial to eventually get the set of the three different sized wheels for more back relaxing enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: alysa

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you have a herniated disc
customer_reviews.text: Not good if you have a herniated disc. It will put you in pain. I rolled very carefully on this wheel twice and it got me in pain both times right away after using it. The wheel is well made and steady. I am sure is good for yoga to gain flexibility if you don’t have back problems.
customer_reviews.author: M. Maier

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful for the Back
customer_reviews.text: After many years of serious back pain I really had my doubts, but even after a few days I truly find this to be a most helpful tool. I hope others with mid or lower back pain will try it. My only complaint is that the user manual does not cover, for example, how long to hold stretches. That would help. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Snapdragon

customer_reviews.title: Upper back relief
customer_reviews.text: There are many products designed for lower back relief and I could not find a solution for my upper back pain. I have done 10min a day (it is uncomfortable the first few times) and I can now sit in a bar stool or a booth or my office chair with no pain which is life changing and it has only been a week. Definitely buy if you are physically able to get on the ground for this back stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Surprise! Love my Yoga Wheel!
customer_reviews.text: I love my Yoga Wheel! It is a great compliment for a yoga practice. I was a little skeptical on how much weight it would be able to hold but I can do all type of poses with it and it holds my body. I love the brand, the color does not wash away or get dirty. Recommend it 100%
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Great for assisting headstands.
customer_reviews.text: With its assistance, from the day I recieved the wheel, I was able to do a headstand. I couldn't do it at all before. That's ultimately what I purchased it for. My plan is to keep using it in my practice until I no longer need it. But it is also nice for massaging the spine. There are lots of uses for it. It appears solid enough to stand the test of time. The padding is thick enough that my spine doesn't hurt when I roll on it.
customer_reviews.author: dandcand

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: I love the UpCircle Seven Yoga Wheel! I have incorporated it into my daily routine and love all the different moves you can do with it! Everything, from stretching to strengthening and so on. The guide that you can download is also helpful to give you ideas of the different exercises that you can do. I'm sure you will love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: Hate it
customer_reviews.text: I hate this item..... Too narrow and falls to the side constantly.... Can not believe it is still available
customer_reviews.author: crendres

customer_reviews.title: good stretch/cracks back
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this for a few days, but so far I love it! It definitely does provide some pain relief for my back. It seems very sturdy as well (my husband used it and he is 250lbs) and the foam is soft as well. If you have back pain i would recommend giving it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my wheel so far!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used my yoga wheel a couple times so far, but I am very happy with it! It is a very sturdy wheel that lets me do all different poses and openings. I’m really excited to use it overtime and hopefully have more range of motion in my shoulders and back. I love that there was a guide sent with it to show different ways to use the wheel to open different areas of the body. I guess the only thing I would like is if the manual had a few more instructions on the different poses they mention, but overall it’s pretty self explanatory! So far I really like it and would recommend it to others!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been having back pain and went to the chiropractor a few times. However, I wanted something to help at home, because stretching only does so much. So I did research on several wheels and this one had better reviews than the Plexus Chirp wheel. This wheel is really sturdy and made well. It does seem to help a lot, versus not using it. I highly recommend it if you have back pain or stiffness!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Helps my back bend
customer_reviews.text: Product is as expected, takes a little time getting use to using the circle. My back and shoulders feels good after using it, which is why I bought it. Would really love a video that shows how to use it instead of pictures. That would shorten the learning curve. Overall good profuct.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wheel to help stretch and strengthen my spine as well as combats poor posture from sitting for prolonged Periods of time and it has done wonders in a letter of weeks. I use it daily at least once and sometimes twice. My boyfriend saw me using it and started using it too- probably even more frequently than I do. Definitely a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Great new addition to my routine
customer_reviews.text: I'm still a beginner in yoga as it's not my main form of exercise and this has added alot of range and positions to my workouts. I would definitely444444 recommend this if you are looking to enhance your flexibility and stretches.4
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you have real back issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a smaller one to help alleviate my lower back pain. I have issues with my sciatic nerve. I already do some stretching and yoga, so I thought this would help. Unfortunately, it made it worse and I can't use them without causing more pain. For general stretching if you don't have back problems, I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Pershing

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the wheel for several weeks now and it has been a great compliment to physical therapy. I have disk degeneration in my spine and struggle with lower back pain and bad posture. I also have a straight spine and using the wheel has helped with tension and pain relief as well as helping me train my spine into it's curve so better support the weight on my spine. Great product! I'm so happy I bought it. I really like that it comes with a digital guide. Thank you for saving on paper!
customer_reviews.author: SylviaYunuen

customer_reviews.title: Bye back pain! No back surgery! This is what you need!
customer_reviews.text: People should know first off this wheel takes time getting used to, it’s not like a soft yoga ball, it’s a million times better!! My husbands back is jacked up from so many Sport accidents Discs bulging everywhere. This has helped him so much. I’m his words it puts the right amount of pressure to his spine to allow those disc to slide back! Better than back surgery! At first it was painful to lay on but now it’s like my back asks me for it!! A must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4life

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretching
customer_reviews.text: I've only briefly used it and while it's been a bit awkward, I expect I'll get used to it. In terms of quality, it is very sturdy and easy to maneuver. Full disclosure, I mainly bought to stretch out my back and it seems like it works. I need more time to give a more robust view, but I'm pleased so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bookie32

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality of them all
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this plus several others and I found this one to be the most durable and has the most firm cushioning made out of cork. I really like the Clark one best due to its sustainability and the inner part of the wheel is made out of a very durable wood-like material that holds 550 pounds I believe. The others are less sturdy, that's why I choose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Extremely painful on your back!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely painful on your back! I am very flexible and thought this would be another great way to work my spine. NOT for me.
customer_reviews.author: nsltspc

customer_reviews.title: surprised it can hold my weight
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a week now and so far so good, i have a roller to massage my muscles and this to stretch my spine/back along with my legs. Surprised it can hold my weight no problem with me being well over 200lbs with barely any flex
customer_reviews.author: Charleston

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: I am 5ft 8in and about 220lbs. I have a hip injury from prior military service, and bad lower back pain. This wheel has been great for stretching my back and providing relief for the backpain and stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This has taken some practice getting used to. I am not as flexible as I thought I was, but I do like using this and practicing with it. I like the stretches that I can get with it. My partner hates it, so it's not for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: I am in love with this wheel!!
customer_reviews.text: This wheel has been life-changing for my back and body! It is AMAZING!! I highly recommended it for anyone interested in improving their flexibility, balance and posture. I would give it more stars if I could!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consider getting a yoga wheel with a spine groove
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t what I was expecting. It has no groove for the spine (which is my fault for overlooking when I bought this product) but it’s something I realized I wanted in a yoga wheel after I had received this. It’s sturdy but hard to balance on when doing certain moves. Overall I wouldn’t buy this again. I don’t use it often because it’s not soft and it’s hard to balance on.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna

product_meta.title: UpCircleSeven Yoga Wheel - [Pro Series] Strongest & Most Comfortable Yoga Prop Wheel, Perfect Accessory for Stretching and Improving Backbends, 12 x 5 Inch Basic
feature_bullets: IMPROVE YOUR YOGA: Considered to be the BEST back opener & stretcher you could have, this yoga wheel will open you up to new sequences & forms. BONUS PDF E-guide is also included w/ each purchase.

STRONGEST WHEEL ON THE MARKET: Able to withstand a WHOPPING 550lbs! Lower quality yoga wheels are made of PVC – which is not safe or durable! This reliable yoga wheel is made to last! It DOES NOT FLEX unlike cheaper competitor products which claim similar strength, helping you perform all movements and poses with ease, safety, and much needed support.

ULTIMATE COMFORT: Surpassing competitive products in both quality and thickness, the UpCircleSeven Yoga Wheel features the THICKEST PADDING available, which cushions your palms, feet, and back while in motion, providing a remarkable sense of comfort.

SWEAT-RESISTANT: Free of moisture accumulation, thanks to its superior padding, you can use your new prop during the most demanding of yoga sessions! Thanks to its sweat-resistance, our yoga wheel does not retain those musky perspiration scents.

PEACE OF MIND: We know you have options, but we want to ensure you get the best with us, and that's why we promise a full 100% QUALITY PROMISE! Ships from the USA. We know you'll love it, but in the rare instance you don’t, simply let us know and we'll issue a full no questions asked refund!
#1 CONSUMER FAVORITE YOGA WHEEL ON AMAZON: Click add to cart NOW and purchase the best yoga wheel that is TRUSTED & APPROVED NATIONWIDE by your very own fellow yogis and yoginis.
